TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Literal extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public Class Literal Inherits Control Implements ITextControl
public ref class Literal : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::ITextControl
type Literal = class inherit Control interface ITextControl

summary.span: 在網頁上保留顯示靜態文字的位置。

span.span: Reserves a location on the Web page to display static text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項保留在網頁上顯示文字的位置。Use the control to reserve a location on the Web page to display text. 控制項是類似控制項，除了控制項不允許您將樣式套用至顯示的文字。The control is similar to the control, except the control does not allow you to apply a style to the displayed text. 您可以透過程式設計方式控制藉由設定控制項中顯示的文字屬性。You can programmatically control the text displayed in the control by setting the property. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需有關安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保護對指令碼會利用在 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[ASP.NET Web Pages 中驗證使用者輸入](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示靜態文字。The following example demonstrates how to use the control to display static text. > [!NOTE] > 下列範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Literal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal/CS/literalcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Literal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal/VB/literalvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 設定控制項的輸入焦點； 控制項上不支援 基底控制項方法。

span.span: Set input focus to a control; the base control method is not supported on a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制覆寫基底類別的方法。The control overrides the method of the base class. 方法控制項一律會擲回的例外狀況，指出不支援方法控制項。The method of a control always throws an exception to indicate that the method is not supported on a control.

summary.span: 取得或設定列舉值，指定 控制項的內容如何呈現。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that specifies how the content in the control is rendered.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定如何內容控制項應該用來呈現。Use the property to specify how the contents of a control should be rendered. 此屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`PassThrough`|不會修改控制項的內容。The contents of the control are not modified.| |`Encode`|控制項的內容會轉換成 HTML 編碼字串。The contents of the control are converted to an HTML-encoded string.| |`Transform`|不支援的標記語言項目會從控制項的內容移除。Unsupported markup-language elements are removed from the contents of the control. 如果支援 HTML 或 XHTML 的瀏覽器上呈現控制項，不會修改控制項的內容。If the control is rendered on a browser that supports HTML or XHTML, the control's contents are not modified.| 如果您指定`PassThrough`的整個內容屬性時，會傳遞至裝置或瀏覽器上，而不進行任何修改。If you specify `PassThrough`, the entire contents of the property are passed to the device or browser without making any modifications. 例如，如果的屬性控制項包含`
`標記，它會傳送至所有裝置和瀏覽器是否支援或不。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, it is sent to all devices and browsers whether it is supported or not. 如果您指定`Encode`，針對內容屬性會轉換成 HTML 編碼字串呈現之前。If you specify `Encode`, the contents for the property are converted into an HTML-encoded string before rendering. 例如，如果的屬性控制項包含`
`標記，則會轉換成`<Hr>`並傳送至裝置或瀏覽器。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, it is converted to `<Hr>` and sent to the device or browser. 如果您指定`Transform`，轉譯行為的屬性取決於所呈現的標記類型。If you specify `Transform`, the rendering behavior of the property depends on the type of markup being rendered. 當控制項的呈現裝置或瀏覽器支援 HTML 或 XHTML，指定會產生相同的行為，與指定。When the control is rendered for a device or browser that supports HTML or XHTML, specifying produces the same behavior as specifying . 所有標記和項目要求的瀏覽器呈現出屬性。All markup tags and elements for the property are rendered for the requesting browser. 當控制項的呈現的 HTML 或 XHTML，例如 WML 或 cHTML 標記語言，您可以使用来移除不支援的標記項目值。When the control is rendered for a markup language other than HTML or XHTML, such as WML or cHTML, you can use the value to remove unsupported markup elements. 在此案例中的任何標記語言項目不支援的目標的標記語言中的屬性不會轉譯控制項。In this case, any markup language elements of the property that are not supported in the targeted markup language are not rendered for the control. 例如，如果的屬性控制項包含`
`內容傳送至 WML 裝置之前，會移除標記，標記。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, the tag is removed before the content is sent to a WML device. 如果不支援的標記包含的內容，標記只會移除，並將內容傳送至裝置或瀏覽器。If an unsupported tag contains content, only the tag is removed and the content is sent to the device or browser. 例如，如果屬性包含的內容`Test`，則``和``移除標記，並"Test"會傳送至裝置或瀏覽器的文字。For example, if the property contains the content `Test`, the `` and `` tags are removed, and the text "Test" is sent to the device or browser. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set a control's property. 屬性的初始值為`Encode`控制項宣告式語法中。The property is initially set to `Encode` in the declarative syntax for the control. 在頁面載入之後，使用者可以按一下按鈕，以設定屬性設`PassThrough`。After the page loads, the user can click a button to set the property to `PassThrough`. 這會導致內容屬性，以不同的方式呈現。This causes the contents of the property to render differently. > [!NOTE] > 下列範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[Literal.Mode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal.Mode/VB/literal.modevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Sends server control content to a provided object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，讓特定的文字一律會顯示前。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific text is always displayed before the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLiteralRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralRender/CS/custom_literal_rendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLiteralRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralRender/VB/custom_literal_rendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLiteralRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralRender/CS/custom_literal_render.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLiteralRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLiteralRender/VB/custom_literal_render.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於 控制項中的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption displayed in the control.

value.span: 顯示於 控制項中的標題。

span.span: The caption displayed in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷中顯示的標題控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the caption displayed in the control. 這可讓您以程式設計方式在執行階段變更標題。This allows you to programmatically change the caption at run time. 標題是 HTML 解碼取決於您將值指派給這個屬性。The caption is HTML-decoded depending on how you assign a value to this property. 如果您將透過屬性的值指派控制項，這個值是顯示已解碼的 HTML。If you assign a value through an attribute of the control, the value is HTML decoded before it is displayed. 比方說，``瀏覽器上呈現為"B"。For example, `` is rendered as "A B" on the browser. 不過，您會設定這個屬性，以程式設計方式或藉由放置的開頭和結尾標記之間的文字，如果標題不是控制項的解碼的 HTML。However, if you set this property programmatically or by placing the text between the opening and closing tags of the control, the caption is not HTML decoded. 例如，` A B `轉譯為 「 A B 」。For example, ` A B ` is rendered as "A B". > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式變更中顯示的標題控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically change the caption displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正常運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Literal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal/CS/literalcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Literal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Literal/VB/literalvb.aspx#1)]
